title: Implement easy login system

requirements.text: Add a prominent, easy-to-find login button to the main application interface that triggers Internet Identity authentication when clicked

quotes: Allow for the  easy log in

acceptanceCriteria: Login button is prominently visible on the main application interface
Clicking the login button initiates the Internet Identity authentication flow
Button uses clear, user-friendly text like 'Login' or 'Sign In'
Button styling is consistent with the Betika green theme

requirements.text: Update the AccessDeniedScreen component to provide a more streamlined and user-friendly login experience with clear call-to-action messaging

quotes: Allow for the  easy log in

acceptanceCriteria: Login prompt uses simple, encouraging language that explains the benefit of logging in
Internet Identity login button is large, clearly visible, and easy to click
Screen design is clean and focused on the login action without unnecessary clutter

requirements.text: Add persistent login state indication that shows the user they are logged in, displaying their identity information or a user menu in the application header

quotes: Allow for the  easy log in

acceptanceCriteria: Logged-in users can see their authentication status in the application interface
User identity information or user menu is displayed in a consistent location (e.g., application header)
Login state persists across page refreshes using the existing useInternetIdentity hook

requirements.text: Add a logout option that is easily accessible to logged-in users, allowing them to sign out from their Internet Identity session

quotes: Allow for the  easy log in

acceptanceCriteria: Logout button or option is visible and accessible to logged-in users
Clicking logout successfully terminates the Internet Identity session
After logout, the application returns to a logged-out state with login options visible

constraints: Must use the existing Internet Identity authentication system configured in useInternetIdentity.ts
Do not modify the authentication logic in useInternetIdentity.ts or useActor.ts
Login flow must integrate with the existing admin authorization system in the backend
nonGoals: Implementing alternative authentication methods beyond Internet Identity
Creating a custom username/password authentication system
